alert.note: Alert for St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST AND NORTHEASTERN ST. JAMES PARISHES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gramercy, or 7 miles west of Reserve, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Wallace, Edgard, North Vacherie, Garyville, and Killona. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 190 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: St. James; St. John The Baptist
